statements: SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE rating > 4
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM CustomerFeedback ORDER BY date_received DESC
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE customer_id = 101
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE date_received BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT feedback_id, rating, date_received FROM CustomerFeedback ORDER BY rating DESC
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE feedback_id = 100;
SELECT customer_id, rating FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE rating > 4;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, rating, date_received FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE date_received BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE feedback_text LIKE '%great%';
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback ORDER BY rating DESC, date_received ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback_id = 1;
SELECT feedback_text, timestamp FROM customer_feedback ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(feedback_id) AS total_feedbacks FROM customer_feedback GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM service_improvement WHERE implemented = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback ORDER BY feedback_id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE timestamp > '2021-01-01'
SELECT feedback_text, COUNT(feedback_id) FROM customer_feedback GROUP BY feedback_text ORDER BY COUNT(feedback_id) DESC
SELECT cf.feedback_text, si.recommendation, si.implemented FROM customer_feedback cf JOIN service_improvement si ON cf.feedback_id = si.feedback_id WHERE si.implemented = TRUE
SELECT cf.customer_id, cf.feedback_text, si.recommendation, si.implemented FROM customer_feedback cf LEFT JOIN service_improvement si ON cf.feedback_id = si.feedback_id
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text, feedback_date FROM customer_feedback ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customer;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, feedback_text, feedback_date FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM service_improvement ORDER BY improvement_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;

SELECT customer.first_name, customer.last_name, customer.email, service_improvement.improvement_description FROM customer INNER JOIN service_improvement ON customer.customer_id = service_improvement.feedback_id;

SELECT customer.first_name, customer.last_name, COUNT(service_improvement.improvement_id) AS total_improvements FROM customer LEFT JOIN service_improvement ON customer.customer_id = service_improvement.feedback_id GROUP BY customer.first_name, customer.last_name ORDER BY total_improvements DESC;
SELECT MAX(improvement_date) AS latest_improvement_date, MIN(improvement_date) AS earliest_improvement_date FROM service_improvement;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback;
SELECT customer_name, feedback_text FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT category_name FROM FeedbackCategories WHERE category_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM FeedbackHistory ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;

SELECT c.customer_name, f.feedback_text, r.rating_value FROM CustomerFeedback c INNER JOIN FeedbackRatings r ON c.rating = r.rating_id LEFT JOIN FeedbackHistory h ON c.feedback_id = h.feedback_id WHERE c.rating >= 4;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback ORDER BY customer_name DESC, rating ASC;
SELECT customer_name, feedback_text FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE rating > 3;

SELECT f.customer_name, c.category_name, r.rating_value FROM CustomerFeedback f JOIN FeedbackHistory h ON f.feedback_id = h.feedback_id JOIN FeedbackCategories c ON h.category_id = c.category_id JOIN FeedbackRatings r ON h.rating_id = r.rating_id;

SELECT f.feedback_id, f.customer_name, c.category_name, h.feedback_date FROM CustomerFeedback f JOIN FeedbackHistory h ON f.feedback_id = h.feedback_id JOIN FeedbackCategories c ON h.category_id = c.category_id ORDER BY h.feedback_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, COUNT(*) AS total_feedback FROM CustomerFeedback GROUP BY customer_name HAVING total_feedback > 1 ORDER BY total_feedback DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT feedback_text, feedback_date FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customer WHERE contact_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT service_name, service_description FROM service WHERE service_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM feedback_rating WHERE rating_value > 3;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customer
SELECT feedback_text, feedback_date FROM customer_feedback
SELECT service_name, service_description FROM service
SELECT category_name FROM feedback_category
SELECT customer_name, contact_number FROM customer ORDER BY customer_name DESC
